pages.index: Casinoviewer - Your Source for the Latest Casino News and Insights Casinoviewer HOME Contact DAILY NEWS 18/12/2024 DELTIN CASINO IN GOA Deltin Royale is open 24X7. However, for pre-purchased bookings made through the call centre and website, the check-in time at the boarding point is from 9:00 a.m. to 11:59 p.m. Deltin Royale is a stationed ship, and the feeder boats transport the guests from our boarding points. We have two boarding points (for check-in): you can board from Fisheries Jetty, Panjim (OPEN 24x7) or Reis Magos Jetty, Nerul (open from 3 p.m. to 4 a.m.). The timing for Reis Magos Jetty may vary and is subject to weather conditions (closed during monsoons). All packages have the same offerings, differing only in the brands of drinks made available to you at the bar. Therefore, you can choose a package based on your preference for alcohol brands. For men, the dress code is formal or smart casual. Shorts, sleeveless T-shirts, flip-flops, and chappals are not permitted. Women can choose to dress in any appropriate evening wear. The casino operates 24/7, thereby serving drinks and snacks at gaming tables round the clock to enhance your gaming experience. Orders must be placed from the tables only; direct orders from the bar are not allowed on the gaming floors. At Vegas Restaurant & Bar, live food counters and bar services begin at 7:00 p.m. Following this, a buffet dinner is served from 8:30 p.m. to 1:00 a.m., and guests can collect drinks from the bar until midnight (with an extension of about 30 minutes on weekends). Throughout this time, guests can enjoy ambient music, followed by live entertainment from 9 p.m. to midnight. You can continue your drinking and snacking experience on the gaming floor once Vegas Restaurant & Bar closes. Similarly, drinks and snack services are available at Sky Bar (rooftop of Deltin Royale) from 7:00 p.m. to 11:30 p.m. (with an extension of about 30 minutes on weekends), with music until 10:00 p.m. Children aged 12 and above have access. The sundeck/Sky Bar is closed throughout the monsoon season and due to unfavorable weather. The children's room opens at 6:30 p.m. and closes at 4:00 a.m. It has a limited capacity and is subject to availability. Moreover, Child and infant entry packages are available in limited quantities.  A kirpan cannot be carried inside Deltin Casinos' premises. Also, backpacks, laptop bags, and bigger-sized bags will not be allowed on board. Guests can use the locker facility at the security desk to deposit their belongings (charges apply). LEARN TO PLAY CASINO GAMES Always wanted to learn how to play the popular casino games like Roulette, Baccarat, Blackjack, Andar Bahar and many more? It's your lucky day!Deltin presents Learn To Play. A video series to teach you ins and outs of major casino games to help you get the upper hand the next time you're at a table. The series is available in 6 languages - English, Hindi, Kannada, Tamil, Telugu, Gujarati.
